## Project: oh-my-lord-opencode

OpenCode plugin with multi-model orchestration, parallel background agents, and LSP/AST tools.

## Commands
```bash
npm run build        # Build plugin
npm run typecheck    # TypeScript check
npm test             # Run tests (bun test)
npm run clean        # Remove dist/
```

## Structure
```
src/
├── agents/          # Agent definitions (worker-paul, etc.)
├── tools/           # MCP tools (ast-grep, lsp, grep, glob, etc.)
├── features/        # Core features (background-agent, hook-injector)
├── hooks/           # OpenCode hooks (hierarchy-enforcer, tdd-enforcement)
├── config/          # Plugin configuration & schema
└── shared/          # Shared utilities
```

## Key Patterns
- Bun runtime, ESM modules
- Zod for schema validation
- MCP SDK for tool definitions
- AST-grep for code analysis
